channel.title: using aa-enforce for those extra aa profiles
channel.description: I have all the extra aa profiles in enforce mode with the exception of two profiles: "/usr/sbin/dnsmasq//libvirt_leaseshelper" and "smbldap-useradd///etc/init.d/nscd" . I get a "not found" reply for these. Can someone share the proper wording to enforce these two profiles. Thanks!

item.title: using aa-enforce for those extra aa profiles
item.dc:creator: ThatNewDude
item.description:
I have all the extra aa profiles in enforce mode with the exception of two profiles: “/usr/sbin/dnsmasq//libvirt_leaseshelper” and “smbldap-useradd///etc/init.d/nscd” . I get a “not found” reply for these. Can someone share the proper wording to enforce these two profiles. Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: using aa-enforce for those extra aa profiles
